Name: Vile Tag
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Sneasel and Weavile.  Swap a Weavile Claw and a Weavile Fang for a Vile Tag at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
